title: Bamboo Designs Plan Schema
description: Schema for Bamboo Designs open catalog plan metadata

plan_id.description: Unique ID for the plan (e.g., BD-LDG-6x8)

category.description: Main category of the plan (e.g., decks, pergolas, pavilions)

dimensions_ft.description: Plan dimensions in feet (width x depth)

type.description: Type or subcategory tags for the plan

skill_level.description: Recommended skill level for building this plan

snow_load_psf.description: Snow load rating in pounds per square foot

climate_zone.description: List of climate zones suitable for this plan

estimated_build_cost_usd.description: Estimated total build cost in USD

product_url.description: Link to the full plan purchase page (e.g., https://bamboodesigns.shop/products)

image_url.description: URL of a thumbnail or low-res watermarked image

license.description: License identifier for this plan entry (e.g., CC0-1.0, CC-BY-4.0)

version_introduced.description: Catalog version in which this plan was first introduced (e.g., v1.0)
